channel.title: Moparscape Staff And Member Need Help
channel.description:
[B]Staff And Members i realy need this problem....i can run server but friends cant log in with my ip....prof Ramli try to fix my problem also cant...[/B]
i show u picture....i only can run server log in 127.0.0.1 and localhost...ip cant log in..
[B]no-ip[/B] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2q3rmvm.jpg[/img]
[b] Port Forward[/b] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/11jrtz8.jpg[/img] [b] Firewall[/b] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/anj3pg.jpg[/img]
When i test on my 508 server and client..i put my client.java change 127.0.0.1 to my runebiz.no-ip.org ip....and compiler...then i try to run my server and run my client..it show me this the bar dosent load..
[b]Only Work on 127.0.0.1 and Localhost[/b]
how to fix it???

item.title: Moparscape Staff And Member Need Help
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:8, topic:228707"]You do realise you can’t login using your IP? Only others can…[/quote]yea…i onlycan log in 127.0.0.1 and localhost…

Read full topic
